name.fil: Mga Rating ng IMDb Para sa Netflix
name.th: การให้คะแนน IMDb สำหรับ Netflix

short.ar: عرض موقع آي إم دي بي
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Show IMDb & Rotten Tomatoes Ratings, Change Playback Speed, Auto Skip Intros, Picture-in-Picture, Netflix Instant Search, And More!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform Your Netflix Experience with IMDb Ratings For Netflix!

Enhance your Netflix viewing experience with our IMDb Ratings For Netflix extension. This powerful tool offers a suite of features designed to give you complete control over your streaming sessions. With IMDb Ratings For Netflix, you'll never have to guess the quality of a movie or series again. Dive into a new level of convenience and enjoy all the additional functionalities that make your Netflix sessions more enjoyable and informative.

Key Features:

1. IMDb and Rotten Tomatoes Ratings

Instantly view IMDb and Rotten Tomatoes ratings for any movie or series directly on Netflix. Make informed decisions about what to watch without leaving the platform.

2. Fade Out Low Rated Movies/Series

Automatically fade out titles with low ratings, helping you focus on high-quality content and save time scrolling through endless options.

3. Change Playback Speed

Customize your viewing experience by adjusting the playback speed. Speed through slow scenes or savor every moment by slowing down the playback.

4. Picture-in-Picture Mode

Watch your favorite Netflix content in a floating window while multitasking. Stay productive or browse other content without missing a scene.

5. Auto Skip Intros and Recaps

Skip repetitive intros and recaps automatically. Jump straight into the action and maximize your viewing time.

6. Show Hidden Netflix Genres

Discover hidden genres on Netflix and explore a broader range of content tailored to your tastes. Uncover niche categories and find new favorites.

7. Instant Search on Netflix

Enhance your search capabilities with instant search results. Find what you’re looking for faster and with more precision.

How to Use:

1. Install the Extension: Download and install the IMDb Ratings For Netflix extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Activate the Features: Once installed, the extension will seamlessly integrate with Netflix, providing you with all its features.
3. Customize Settings: Access the extension settings to customize the features according to your preferences.
4. Enjoy Enhanced Viewing: Start streaming on Netflix and enjoy all the enhanced functionalities.

Why Choose IMDb Ratings For Netflix?

1. Informed Viewing Decisions: With ratings and reviews at your fingertips, choose the best content without switching between apps.
2. Time-Saving Features: Skip intros and low-rated content to get the most out of your streaming time.
3. Enhanced Viewing Flexibility: Adjust playback speed and use Picture-in-Picture to fit your viewing into your lifestyle seamlessly.
4. Discover More Content: Hidden genres and enhanced search help you find content that might otherwise go unnoticed.

Download Now and Elevate Your Netflix Experience!

Disclaimer: IMDb Ratings For Netflix is an unofficial extension and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Netflix. This extension is designed to enhance your Netflix experience by providing additional features not available in the native Netflix app. All content streamed via this extension is subject to Netflix's terms of service and usage policies.
